hierarchy.name: AI Consulting
hierarchy.intro:
I assist organizations in strategizing and implementing AI platforms, developing custom AI agents trained on their data to improve user engagement, streamline operations, and revolutionize business processes.

I've created three flexible service paths to meet you wherever you are on your AI adoption journey

children.name: AI Education & Training
children.footnotes: For agencies: These training programs provide the perfect foundation for adding AI consulting and implementation to your client service portfolio. Imagine offering these capabilities alongside your existing expertise!

children.name: AI Discovery & Strategy
children.footnotes: For agencies: This strategic approach helps you position AI-driven automation as a premium service offering. Imagine helping your clients transform their operations through thoughtfully applied AI!

children.name: AI Infrastructure & Implementation
children.intro: Bringing Your AI Vision to Life
children.footnotes: For agencies: These implementation services create exciting opportunities to offer AI as a managed service or value-added solution for your clients. Imagine expanding your portfolio with cutting-edge capabilities!

hierarchy.name: Web Development
hierarchy.intro: I have built and managed complex, multilingual, and multi-site web platforms that are secure, user-friendly, and scalable. My expertise includes site building, front-end theming, and working with Drupal as a headless CMS for React-based web apps and native mobile applications.

children.name: Web Audits
children.intro: Review my website for SEO, performance, accessability

children.name: Web Maintenance
children.intro: Options for keeping your site up to date

hierarchy.name: Creative Design & Animation
hierarchy.intro: My background in digital graphic design and animation allows me to create visually compelling and interactive digital assets that enhance user experience across web, broadcast, theatre, and print media.

hierarchy.name: Project Management & Leadership
hierarchy.intro: Experienced in leading teams, managing projects from conception to deployment, and ensuring timely delivery while meeting high-quality standards. I have also set up internal tools and systems to improve process management.
